tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VisitorInformation (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  visit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  visit_purpose VARCHAR(100),
  visitor_company VARCHAR(100),
  visitor_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE visitors (
  id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE visit_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_id BIGINT REFERENCES visitors(id),
  visit_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  purpose TEXT,
  log_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Visitors (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  email STRING,
  phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Visitors (
  visitor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  visitor_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  visitor_phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  visit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Visits (
  visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_id UUID NOT NULL,
  visit_purpose TEXT,
  visit_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  visit_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE VisitLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_id INT,
    visit_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (visitor_id) REFERENCES Visitor(visitor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditLog (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES VisitLog(log_id)
);
